column4: Might anyone be able to help me fix a problem with my SB Live! 24 bit sound card?  I have sound but it is real scratchy and jumpy.
check out this thread and see if it helps....http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=19307&highlight=sound+blaster+24bit
Thos were the directions I used to get it to work, but hte sound is scratchy and jumpy.
yeah, actually I saw that after, sorry
